PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-12932013-11-28,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS,  CBSA
ActCustoms Act
SubjectCCOFTA Verification of Origin Regulations
PrecisCCOFTA VERIFICATION OF ORIGIN REGULATIONS in order to incorporate the CANADA-COLUMBIA FREE TRADE AGREEMENT (CCOFTA) into Canada's existing regulatory framework by allowing customs procedures related to rules of origin to be administered in accordance with the terms of the CCOFTA.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0217 Publication Date: 2013-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
